site_name: City Of London CemeteryAldersbrook RoadManor ParkLondonE12 5DG
description: Repairs to the external masonry, roof and rainwater goods of the Church & Chapel buildings to remedy the existing dilapidated state of the buildings.The proposal will include:-  The removal & replacement of all existing, damaged lining & flashing details to the existing guttering with a liquid waterproofing membrane-  The repair & redecoration of the all rainwater goods -  The repair and replacement of all slipped, broken & missing roof tiles -  The conservation & repair of damaged stonework with pinning & application of shelter coats-  The replacement of severely decayed stonework with like for like materials -  The repair of cracking within the Church Bell Tower(This application site contains Grade II Listed Buildings).
